solution_line_template: Trisha's pay before taxes is {hourly_rate} dollars an hour x {hours_per_week} hours per week x {weeks_per_year} weeks = <<{hourly_rate}*{hours_per_week}*{weeks_per_year}={annual_gross_pay}>>{annual_gross_pay} dollars

The amount withheld is {withholding_percent_text} percent, or {withholding_rate_decimal} x {annual_gross_pay} = <<{withholding_rate_decimal}*{annual_gross_pay}={withheld_amount}>>{withheld_amount} dollars
